title: Strengthening Practical Competencies in Systems Design: Mobile TBL for Enhancing Interprofessional Collaboration in Healthcare

context.prior_knowledge: Structure of healthcare systems and basic concepts of interdisciplinary professional collaboration
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can analyze pre-provided materials via mobile platforms to explain three core principles of interprofessional collaboration
Learners can propose at least two collaboration strategies in patient safety scenarios through team-based simulations
Learners can apply interprofessional ethical conflict resolution procedures with an 80% or higher accuracy rate in formative assessments
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
